name: Out Of Fuel (Tibaianice Games)
description:
Your wife is angry, and you need to get home as soon as possible so you don't get in trouble anymore, but your car isn't helping you much, the fuel tank is bored.

To accomplish this difficult task you will need to collect fuel as you progress in the game, as well as dodge other automobiles and obstacles that may come your way.

The more time goes by it seems the faster the other cars drive, or is it you who are treading the accelerator the most?

Key Features:
• Drive as far as you can without running out of fuel
• Avoid obstacles, cars and animals on the road
• Collect coins to get vehicle upgrades
• Try to beat your friends record

More planned future implementations.
